attributes.action: Create a public holiday to commemorate the birth of Joe Smith, musician
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Question-How do we save the citizens of tomorrow? Answer-By making August 18th National Joe Smith Underdog Day. It is the only way to inspire our young people into wanting to make something of themselves- create a day dedicated to a true underdog. Joe Smith finished 27th in the last series of Xfactor, a feat which in itself is impressive. But Joe refused to back down and when the world turned its back on Smith, he just kept on trying until eventually, the music industry sat up and listened and said "Joe Smith, you're a lyrical genius". Using such a figure as Smith would show young people the fruition of persisting with ambition. Forget hug-a- hoodie or ASBO's, national JOE SMITH AMBITION DAY is the way to save our youth.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
